verses.text: \w When|strong="G2064"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, brothers, \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w did|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w eloquence|strong="G3056"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="G2605"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* resolved \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* weakness \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5156"\w*.

Spiritual Wisdom (Ephesians 1:15–23)

\w Among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w mature|strong="G5046"\w*, \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* message \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*—\w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w age|strong="G5046"\w* \w or|strong="G3761"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* rulers \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w age|strong="G5046"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* coming \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w No|strong="G3739"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* mysterious \w and|strong="G2316"\w* hidden \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Or we speak God’s wisdom in a mystery\f* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w He|strong="G3739"\w* destined \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w time|strong="G1722"\w* began.

\w None|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* rulers \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* age \w understood|strong="G1097"\w* \w it|strong="G1063"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w*, \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G4717"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Rather|strong="G3756"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: “\w No|strong="G3756"\w* \w eye|strong="G3788"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w ear|strong="G3775"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* heard, \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* imagined, \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* love \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.”\f + \fr 2:9 \ft Isaiah 64:4\f*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* revealed \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w searches|strong="G2045"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* deep \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w knows|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* own \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*? \w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w too|strong="G2532"\w*, \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w knows|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w understand|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w freely|strong="G5483"\w* \w given|strong="G5483"\w* \w us|strong="G5483"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w taught|strong="G1318"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* human \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w taught|strong="G1318"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, expressing \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* truths \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*.\f + \fr 2:13 \ft Or to spiritual people\f*

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w natural|strong="G5591"\w* \w man|strong="G3756"\w* \w does|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w accept|strong="G1209"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w understand|strong="G1097"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w spiritually|strong="G4153"\w* discerned.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* judges \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* himself \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3762"\w* subject \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3762"\w*’s judgment.

“\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w so|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w instruct|strong="G4822"\w* \w Him|strong="G3739"\w*?”\f + \fr 2:16 \ft Isaiah 40:13 (see also LXX)\f* \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
